message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $180, but I'm open to hearing your thoughts.
I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $100?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $180 is my ideal price, I could come down to $150.  I believe this product offers significant value, even at that price.
I understand that the product has value, but $150 is still a bit high for me. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
